blogPost.excerpt: Using AI to analyze property photos, Remodel It provides design inspiration, instant free remodeling estimates, and connects you to nearby contractors.
blogPost.body: Using AI to analyze property photos, Remodel It provides design inspiration, instant free remodeling estimates, and connects you to nearby contractors.
blogPost.title: Remodel It - AI that reads property photos to create home reno estimates
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 利用人工智能分析房产照片，Remodel It提供设计灵感、即时免费改造估价，并将你与附近的承包商联系起来。
localize.tagline: 能读懂房产照片的人工智能，创造出房屋重新装修的估计。

localize.description: 利用人工智能分析房產照片，Remodel It提供設計靈感、即時免費改造估價，並將你與附近的承包商聯繫起來。
localize.tagline: 能讀懂房產照片的人工智能，創造出房屋重新裝修的估計。

previous.excerpt: Idenati is designed to simplify your experience, to organize everything you do online in one place, allowing you to focus and be more productive.
previous.title: Idenati - Organize everything you do online in one place

next.title: SACKLER FAMILY OF NYC TO PAY $4.5b TO SETTLE OPIOID CRISIS THEY STARTED, NO JAIL TIME

localize.full_text: 纽约市的萨克勒家族将支付45亿美元来解决他们引发的鸦片危机，不需要坐牢。
紐約市的薩克勒家族將支付45億美元來解決他們引發的鴉片危機，不需要坐牢。
